author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Man killed in road accident

Ramraj (33) was killed, and four others injured when two cars had a head-on collision near a fuel station at Anthiyur near Gomangalam on Tuesday.

The injured were rushed to the Udumalpet government hospital. Ramaraj (33) died on the way.

The four others have been referred to Coimbatore Medical College Hospital, and their condition is said to be stable.
title: Crime Notes (Three Items)
